thread.title: Phil & Patti

author: Phil & Patti
title: Phil & Patti
text: We were having trouble placing our second order (new to pickleball) at PickleballCentral... forgot password! Called customer service and spoke with a wonderful customer representative who helped take our order and reset our password. Recieved our order promptly and were very satisfied. Thanks to all at PickleballCentral and especially your friendly customer service representative.
